title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 397.6 - Reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 397.6 - Reimbursement

State Regulations

Expenditures properly made by social services districts
under this Part, including costs of administration, shall be reimbursed by the

State in an amount equal to one half of such expenditures after first deducting
any Federal funds properly received or to be received on account
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
397.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
